nodes.text: Lubboon was a male Duros who lived during the Republic Dark Age. He served the Daimanate Sith state as the administrator of a factory located in the city Xakrea on the planet Darkknell, and fathered the Duros Beadle Lubboon. In 1032 BBY, the Human mercenary Jarrow Rusher visited Lubboon's factory, and he persuaded Lubboon to arrange for him to receive some starship parts, in return for Beadle being permitted to join Rusher's mercenary force.
